name: Attack
note: スキル1番は攻撃コマンドに対応します。

name: Defense
note: スキル2番は防御コマンドに対応します。

description:
This is a frame for skills that you want to display above the combat
skills when you open the menu.
name: -----Reserve

stacked up to two times.

TP)

A punch filled with a young girl's rage. The punch, enhanced by magic,
can even break bones.

description: Grips the enemy's forehead with sheer strength.

defense.

Shoots at the enemy's feet, reducing their agility. Occasionally, the

attack all enemies.
